name: Ancestry
description:
You're responsible for your bloodline! Protect them as long as you can!

Ancestry is a arcade survival bullet hell game

Features
  • Bullet Hell gameplay
  • Local highscore
  • Pop's age as you progress (And their childs)
  • Chiptune sound FX
  • 50 Seconds Highly Audible Terrible Music 

This game made by Wolderado and Belaniax for Ludum Dare 44 in 72 hours
